scripts.package: npm run build:prod && cd build && node package.js
scripts.package:extension: npm run build:prod && cd build && node package.js --extension-only
scripts.package:gh-pages: npm run build:prod && cd build && node package.js --gh-pages-only
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: npm run build:prod && echo '✅ Build completed. Push to GitHub to deploy to Pages.'
scripts.test:payment: echo '🧪 Testing payment page...' && echo '🌐 GitHub Pages: https://jeonsun3629.github.io/petExtension/docs/payment.html'
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && npm run package
